definition[0]: if you feel or believe in something strongly, you are very sure and serious about it
example[0]: I’m strongly opposed to capital punishment.
example[1]: We strongly believe that she is innocent.
example[2]: I’m strongly in favour of marriage.
definition[1]: in a way that is meant to persuade someone to do something
example[3]: Before taking action, you are strongly recommended to consult an accountant.
definition[2]: in a way that is easy to notice
example[4]: The house smelt strongly of food.
